name: Learn Japanese
description:
Usually learning a new language requires significant determination and dedication, but this game requires neither! Learn Japanese is a language learning simulation game where players actually learn the Japanese language. Learn Japanese aims to provide an innovative method to learn the Japanese language. The learning process is intuitive so that players can learn the Japanese language very naturally with minimal effort. By the end of the game, you will have learned the basics of the language.

Learn Japanese is the fastest way to learn the Japanese language because players will learn the Japanese characters, words and grammar at the same time. Players will solve puzzles together with instructors. In the process of puzzle solving, players will naturally learn the Japanese language.

The game is very beginner friendly and will familiarize players with the basics of the Japanese language. If you are interested in learning the Japanese language, this game will be an excellent starting point. Even if you are not interested, knowing the basics of a language must be useful and will deepen your insight into the world.

Learning a language should not be something stressful. With Learn Japanese, learning a language is like playing a game!

Features
Lesson mode and practice mode
English text and voice instruction
Japanese pronunciation
Players will learn the Japanese characters (Hiragana), words and grammar
